THDC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 05 General Manager Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Jul 22, 2025, 14:47 IST
 Tehri Hydro Development Corporation Limited
 5 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Jul-2025 |  Uttarakhand |  Salary : 100,000 to 280,000




FOLLOW

The Teri Hydro Development Corporation Limited (THDC) has officially released the notification to fill up 05 Additional General Manager, Deputy General Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their CA/ICMA can apply for the THDC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Uttarakhand.

THDC Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Additional General Manager	02	CA/ ICMA
Deputy General Manager	03

THDC Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 53 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

THDC Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

THDC Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

SC/ST/OBC candidates: NIL.
For General candidates: Rs. 600/-.

THDC Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 1,00,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 2,80,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the THDC Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the THDC Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	22-07-2025
Closing date	21-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
